sentences.en: All the examiners commented that Jack an impressively clear head and considerable powers of independent criticism.
sentences.cn: 所有考官们评论说杰克思路清晰,给人印象深刻,独立判断能力也相当强.

sentences.en: EVERYTHING to do with mining is impressively vast.
sentences.cn: 一切与采矿有关的东西都非常庞大.

sentences.en: He discoursed impressively on Newton's theory of gravity.
sentences.cn: 他讲述了牛顿的引力定律,给人以深刻的印象.

sentences.en: He found himself inventing such impressively nonsensical propositions.
sentences.cn: 他写下了这样惹人注意的无聊话.

sentences.en: He spoke very low, advisedly, and impressively.
sentences.cn: 他谈到很低, 慎重, 并有声有色.
他说了他令人难忘的故事.

sentences.en: He touched his head impressively, and I nodded.
sentences.cn: 他郑重其事地用手碰碰脑袋, 我也点了点头.

sentences.en: The admonitions seem to work, for the streets are impressively clean.
sentences.cn: 警告似乎起了作用, 因为大街上令人难忘地干净.

sentences.en: The historical research was impressively diligent.
sentences.cn: 该项历史研究非常地认真、彻底。

sentences.en: The policeman on the beat moved up the avenue impressively.
sentences.cn: 纽约的一条大街上,一位值勤的警察正沿街走着.

sentences.en: This candidate has an impressively diverse range of interests and experience.
sentences.cn: 5这位候选人有着令人惊叹的广泛的兴趣与丰富的经历.

sentences.en: This time Milutinovic has progressed through the qualifying stage with his team and impressively so.
sentences.cn: 而这一次,他和他的球队共同经历了预选赛的过程,表现令人瞩目.

sentences.en: Under the influence of nitrous oxide , he found himself writing such impressively nonsensical propositions.
sentences.cn: 在笑气影响下, 他写下了这样惹人注意的无聊话.

words.tran_cn: 敏感的；感受性强烈的；易感动的
感人的；令人钦佩的；给人以深刻印象的
印象；效果，影响；压痕，印记；感想

trans.tran_cn: 令人难忘地,  令人印象深刻地
